summary: The Estimator class implements the core functionality of a BaseEstimator, providing a unified interface to compute expectation values. It supports exact calculation when no shot limit is set, or stochastic sampling using a normal‑distribution approximation when a finite number of shots is specified. A configurable random seed or generator ensures reproducible sampling.
business_intent: Enable users to obtain expectation values from quantum or statistical models with flexible precision—either exact results for analytical workflows or sampled estimates for performance‑constrained scenarios—while maintaining reproducibility.
